page.title: 08FARMS
page.content: {There}are six farms in the area.The six farms are Ranelagh,White house, Mayfield,Kilbees,Lovel hill and Fernhill. {White house,Lovel hill and Fernhill are residential.Fernhill farm has a foreign owner. {Ranelagh}farm is used for pasture land and hay.Ranelagh farm is a small farm about 60 acres.About 11 oclock when the grass is dry,it is cut for the next five days.Then it is turned to dry out and on the fifth day it is bailed.This is very hard work and tiring. It has 21 horses,20 cattle. {Mayfield }farm is used for poultry,cattle and beef.It is also used for grazing and the farm sells eggs and potatoes. {Kilbees}farm is owned by Lady Willingdon and she has a horse stud and pony stock.
